list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: declare (someone) to be guilty of a criminal offense by the verdict of a jury or the decision of a judge in a court of law.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the theives were convicted of the robbery
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những tên trộm đã bị kết án về vụ cướp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person found guilty of a criminal offense and serving a sentence of imprisonment.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: two escaped convicts kidnapped them at gunpoint
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hai kết án trốn thoát đã bắt cóc họ tại Gunpoint
